Changelog
=========

Version 1.0
***********

*Released April 2024*

First release to prod. This is a working version with the main focus being CSV --> UML/SQL

.. Improvements
   ~~~~~~~~~~~~

   The CSV file should contain the following information per line:

   Internal changes
   ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

   - Added the dictTo***() functions

Future fixes
~~~~~~~~~~~~

- ``fkSQL`` description in the formatStrings.py docstring appears in bold when the maximum line length is limited to 72 chars in the py module.
